meanings.definition: The state of being fully cooked or finished.
meanings.sent1: The doneness of the steak was perfect for my taste.
meanings.sent2: She checked the doneness of the cake by inserting a toothpick.
meanings.sent3: The chef proudly displayed the doneness of his culinary masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: The doneness of the project was evident in the final presentation.
meanings.sent5: The doneness of the pasta was just right, not too soft or too firm.

meanings.definition: The quality or condition of being completed or accomplished.
meanings.sent1: The doneness of the puzzle brought a sense of satisfaction.
meanings.sent2: He assessed the doneness of the job before submitting it.
meanings.sent3: The doneness of the race was celebrated with cheers and applause.
meanings.sent4: The doneness of the plan was evident in its successful execution.
meanings.sent5: The doneness of the painting captured the artist's vision perfectly.
